message: Let's start with a fair offer. I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but we can negotiate.
You took 90%, that's a bit too greedy. I'll offer a more balanced split, but I'm still not giving you the majority.
I understand you want a fair share, and I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it evenly.  We both get 500000.  We can't keep going back and forth forever, and inflation will only hurt us both.
